pages.text: $(li)Cockroaches are tiny brown passive insects that can be attracted with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sugar)Sugar$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will free if near light or players are near them.$(br)$(li)Cockroaches may drop their $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/cockroach_wing_fragment)Cockroach Wing Frament$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)They will eat any food item dropped on the ground.
$(li)Do you want to teach your tiny cute Cuckroach to dance? Then give it a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/maraca)Maraca$(/l)!
